comment.text: This translation key "UpgradePlan" is used to describe an upgrade plan option in a UI dialogue. It appears as a button label and prompts the user to initiate an upgrade process.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "قم بالترقية إلى خطة جديدة" (Qum bil-tarqiya ila khittah jadeeda) is a literal translation, but a more natural and common phrasing for 'Upgrade plan' in a Saudi Arabian context would be something like "ترقية الخطة" (Tarqiyat al-khutta) or "تحديث الخطة" (Tahdeeth al-khutta). "قم بالترقية إلى خطة جديدة" is a bit too verbose and formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ترقية الخطة (Tarqiyat al-khutta) or تحديث الخطة (Tahdeeth al-khutta)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Planı yeniləyin' translates to 'Update the plan' or 'Renew the plan', not simply 'Upgrade plan'. It implies an action rather than a description.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Yüksəlmiş plan' or 'Premium plan' for a more accurate translation of 'Upgrade plan' as a noun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Plan upgraden" is not idiomatic German. "Upgraden" is a direct borrowing from English and sounds awkward. A more natural translation would use German phrasing.
"Plan upgraden" uses a verb-second construction that isn't standard in many German contexts. Although not strictly incorrect, it sounds less professional.
While 'Päivitä ohjelma' is grammatically correct, it translates to 'Update program' rather than 'Upgrade plan'. 'Upgrade' has a slightly different connotation than 'Update'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Tilaa päivitys' or 'Päivitä tilaus' to better reflect 'Upgrade plan'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Aumentar o plano" is a literal translation of "Upgrade plan", it doesn't fully capture the nuance of an upgrade in a subscription or service context. It sounds a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Atualizar o plano" or "Melhorar o plano" which are more commonly used for upgrades in a service context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'සැලසුම උත්ශ්‍රේණි කරන්න' while literally meaning 'upgrade the plan', isn't the most natural or common way to express 'Upgrade plan' in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'වැඩසිටුවනය උත්ශ්‍රේණි කිරීම' or 'වැඩසිටුවනය වැඩිදියුණු කිරීම'.

While "Aktualizovať plán" is a possible translation, "Upgrade plan" often implies a shift to a higher tier or more comprehensive service. "Aktualizovať" simply means to update. A more accurate translation might be something like "Vylepšený plán" or "Plán na vyššiu úroveň".

The Serbian translation 'План надоградње' is not the most natural or commonly used translation for 'Upgrade plan'. A more common and accurate translation would be 'План за надоградњу' or 'Надградни план'. 'Надоградње' feels slightly awkward in this context.

The translation 'Підвищити план' doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Upgrade plan'. 'Підвищити' implies raising something, while 'Upgrade' suggests an improvement or advancement of a plan. A more accurate translation would focus on the improvement aspect.

While "升级版本" (shēngjí bǎnběn) can mean "upgrade version", it doesn't directly translate "Upgrade plan" which implies a plan to upgrade, not just the version itself. A more accurate translation would convey the aspect of a plan or scheme.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "升级方案" (shēngjí fāng'àn - upgrade scheme/plan) or "升级计划" (shēngjí jìhuà - upgrade plan).
